Explore your Scottish heritage

Getting started

Search the records

Search Type

Search people records

Search place records

Search Virtual Volume records

Please use these links for Ordnance Survey Name Books and Tax Rolls to search these newly released records.

Search for records by administrative areas, such as parishes, counties, burghs and cities.

Searches are limited to records in the Virtual Volumes area. This includes:

  • Church court records
  • Ordnance Survey records
  • Tax records
  • Scottish Cabinet records
For more information, see our guide on searching by place.

 

You can also browse an A-Z list of places.

Search options

Exact names only Searches for records matching the exact spelling of your input, ensuring precise results without variations or misspellings.

Fuzzy matching Finds records that closely resemble your input, allowing for slight variations or common misspellings in names or terms.

Wildcards allowed Use special characters (e.g., *, ?) in your search input to represent unknown or variable characters, expanding search flexibility.

Names that begin with Retrieves records of names starting with the specified letters, useful for finding entries with common prefixes or partial names.

Phonetic matching Searches for records that sound like your input, capturing variations in spelling that share the same pronunciation.

Search tools

Search options

Exact names only Searches for records matching the exact spelling of your input, ensuring precise results without variations or misspellings.

Fuzzy matching Finds records that closely resemble your input, allowing for slight variations or common misspellings in names or terms.

Wildcards allowed Use special characters (e.g., *, ?) in your search input to represent unknown or variable characters, expanding search flexibility.

Names that begin with Retrieves records of names starting with the specified letters, useful for finding entries with common prefixes or partial names.

Phonetic matching Searches for records that sound like your input, capturing variations in spelling that share the same pronunciation.

Search tools

Volume search

Search for a specific volume by reference or search all volumes by date range.

Search for a volume

Record creator search

Search for records of a kirk session, presbytery or other court or institution.

Search record creators

Place search

Search for all records relating to a place such as a parish, county or city.

Search places

Scottish Cabinet records search

Search for Cabinet records of the Scottish Government.

Search Cabinet records

Tax rolls search

Search for 17th/18th Century tax rolls.

Search tax rolls

Ordnance Survey Name Books

Search for Ordnance Survey Name Books.

Search Ordnance Survey Name Books
